Text: JENNIFER CATO corporatecontract recruiterHRHello Jeffrey I came across your company information as I was conducting research on the Dallas Business Journal website The article mentioned that Enron was moving into an office complex in Frisco TX and could potentially employ up to employees I have recently been laid off as a contractcorporate recruiter with Nortel Networks and am interested in pursuing opportunities with Enron as you grow into your new Frisco location By bringing my recruiting skills and background inhouse as a contract or corporate recruiter Enron can save thousands of dollars in potential external headhunter fees Attached is my resume for your review and distribution If you have any questions or require further information dont hesitate to contact me directly at or Jeffrey thank you for your time and consideration please redirect me if there is someone else I need to speak with All the Best Jennifer Cato Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger Resume doc
